#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int gcd(int a,int b)
{
	if(b==0)
		return a;
	return(gcd(b,a%b));
}
int main()
{
	int a,b,c;
	while(scanf("%d%d%d",&a,&b,&c)!=EOF)
	{
		if(a*a+b*b==c*c)
		{
			if(a<0)
				a=-a;
			if(b<0)
				b=-b;
			if(c<0)
				c=-c;
			if(gcd(a,gcd(b,c))==1)
				printf("YES\n");
			else
				printf("NO\n");
		}
		else
			printf("NO\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
